ui.viralSub: Scan QR code to start the test

guide.purpose: This assessment measures the 'Dark Triad' personality traits to analyze your hidden social strategies and instincts.
guide.instruction: Read each statement and select the option that best matches your usual thoughts. The more honest you are, the more accurate your profile will be.
guide.interpretation: Results consist of Narcissism (self-love), Machiavellianism (strategic manipulation), and Psychopathy (emotional detachment). This isn't about good or evilâ€”it's about your survival strategies.

items.text: I feel I am a special person and deserve better treatment than others.
To achieve my goals, I can skillfully persuade or manipulate people.
I don't feel emotionally affected when I see others' misfortune or pain.
I really enjoy being the center of attention and receiving praise from others.
I tend to keep important information to myself and use it at advantageous moments.
When doing dangerous or thrilling things, I feel excitement rather than fear.
I see myself as just an ordinary person and try to act humbly.
Deceiving someone for personal gain is morally absolutely unacceptable.

N.high: You have strong confidence and leadership qualities, though you may be overly conscious of others' perceptions.
N.low: You are humble, cooperative, and prioritize the interests of the community.

M.high: You are quick to assess situations, strategic, and goal-orientedâ€”an ambitious type.
M.low: You value honest and transparent communication and stick to your principles.

P.high: You maintain composure in crisis situations and demonstrate bold decisiveness.
P.low: You have excellent empathy and carefully consider others' feelings.
